website_summaries.verdict: This table is easy to assemble and will hold up to heavy use.
pros: An affordable table with a  hardwood, polyurethane-finished surface that plays smoothly
The 2 legs function as storage cabinets for pucks
Comes with wax and 8 pucks in 2 colors
cons: included wax may be too fast

customer_reviews.title: Great value...a fun table for sure!
customer_reviews.text: Don't recommend this table. Could not adjust the convex pattern to concave with the adjusters. The climate adjusters stripped. Blue Wave customer service was very good and they sent us another table. Same thing with this one but worse, the board is warped. I would give this zero stars if it were possible. Blue Wave is fine, the product is inferior.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Very fun game and a very nice product. It's basic and until I'm ready to step up another class this is just fine. Extremely heavy but simple to assemble. Instructions do not offer much help for board prep. But YouTube will help with that. It was packaged very well no damage and delivery was great too.
customer_reviews.author: holly12345

customer_reviews.title: Box not damaged, board inside damaged.
customer_reviews.text: When we opened the box a piece of the plastic corner was broken completely off and one part of the legs was cracked. The legs are composite so I’m afraid the section that is cracked is going to get worse with time.
customer_reviews.author: Georgiana S.

customer_reviews.title: Hard to use, expensive disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Hard to level. Dust that cones with it is way too fast. Had to buy a different jar
customer_reviews.author: katiee

customer_reviews.title: Great Table for Heavy Use
customer_reviews.text: Solid table. Put in a Fraternity at USC. Guys love it. Balanced and solid. Played daily. Packing was great and nothing was damaged. Took about 30 mins to put the few pieces together and we were done.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the family!
customer_reviews.text: The shuffleboard table has been great fun for the whole family and looks good. The 9’ table is good for our summer house and the older boys play for hours. It is quite heavy when delivered but assembly did not take long.
customer_reviews.author: perkins

customer_reviews.title: Love my shuffleboard table
customer_reviews.text: Love my shuffleboard table! Always wanted one, and I finally spent the money...this is a good one, easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Bertles

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my husband and it's a great purchase. We always have company over and like to entertain. Just FYI, wax it comes with is too fast, I recommend wax speed 6 for 9' table, anything lower will be too fast and your puck will fly across the table.
customer_reviews.author: dballard07

customer_reviews.title: Was bigger than I thought but boy what fun our family is having with it
customer_reviews.text: Was bigger than I thought but boy what fun our family is having with it! It was not hard to assemble either !
customer_reviews.author: Cathleen Broussard

customer_reviews.title: Great Item, if it's not damaged
customer_reviews.text: We love it but it was damaged and it is IMPOSSIBLE to get them to send a replacement piece. Soooo hope yours is fine and you'll be very please, otherwise it may be a long and annoying journey.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Keller

customer_reviews.title: Love our table
customer_reviews.text: Love our table! Was able to assemble with only two men and play the day we received it. Great purchase! Recommend you level both legs together before attaching to table top and purchasing another slower wax. The wax they include doesn't work well for us.
customer_reviews.author: lynne

customer_reviews.title: For the money this is a great table, went together pretty easy and plays well
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great table, went together pretty easy and plays well. I've seen other tables for more than twice the money and the only difference is the playing surface was a little wider, 32" instead of the 31" this table has but doesn't effect the game in any way. I wouldn't hesitate buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mark beaman

customer_reviews.title: Best New Years ever!
customer_reviews.text: I received the shuffle board before New Years and invited 6 people to spend the night and play the game on New Years Eve. We had a blast! Thank you, Christine
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Game on!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I have so much fun playing this. This is a really nice one.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Game Room
customer_reviews.text: OMG, we love this game. It is perfect for all game rooms and man caves.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marine

customer_reviews.title: Great winter fun.
customer_reviews.text: Lots of fun filled hours with this table. Grand kids are becoming quite good at it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Dewhirst

customer_reviews.title: My husband and I love playing this game in the evening after work
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I love playing this game in the evening after work. It’s much better than spending hours sitting and watching TV!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Just check the box asap for broken legs
customer_reviews.text: Was happy with the shuffle board but just check the box our legs were broke and waited about a week to get them replaced.
customer_reviews.author: cindy lawson

customer_reviews.title: This shuffleboard table is nice enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: This shuffleboard table is nice enough for the price. I was slightly disappointed in the with the cosmetic quality. It is difficult the get the table level when it is an area with carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Thrifty Moma

customer_reviews.title: Damaged like other Reviews
customer_reviews.text: Product was late getting here and damaged on multiple legs. Wood veneer was also chipped and missing paint.
customer_reviews.author: DAVID

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: The table came with multiple damaged spots and the “cherry” wood is practical board with red wrap. Save your money and don’t buy.
customer_reviews.author: KLD

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the whole family.
customer_reviews.text: Table arrived. We love it, being played constantly by our 5 and 7 year old boys.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Weidling

customer_reviews.title: Scratches
customer_reviews.text: There were scratches on the doors of the leg base. Otherwise would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking
customer_reviews.text: Was shipped to us 2 times. Both times the legs were damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and delivered on time - not one ding or mishap Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Patti McNary Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Very difficult to level it.
customer_reviews.text: It is insanely hard to level it. I'm still struggling to make it happen. I have watched YouTube but can't do it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: having a hard time adnusting play surface, pucks keep ...
customer_reviews.text: having a hard time adnusting play surface, pucks keep sliding off the sides. also, cant find a decent powder/wax....please advise
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Arendash

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shipping and delivery. Easy assembly, great quality, exact color match.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Table is pretty nice for the price I paid
customer_reviews.text: Table is pretty nice for the price I paid. The wood on top is a little warped so the pucks slide off if get them to close to the edge (even after adjusting the bolts under the table).

customer_reviews.title: Damaged. Missing critical parts in the box.
customer_reviews.text: Had the following issues: 1. Top of legs are damaged. 2. Bolts were missing from the package. Have to go to the hardware store and buy them myself after spending $800 on this product.
customer_reviews.author: Lee B

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good table and fun to play but having some issues with surface
customer_reviews.author: it

customer_reviews.title: Love our table.
customer_reviews.text: Table is very nice. Comes almost completely assembled. Can't beat the quality of this table. Very solid and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: James m GIlbert

customer_reviews.title: Best form of Entertainment.
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect. We use it to entertain all the time. The quality is SUPERB.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: It's like Ikea furniture
customer_reviews.text: Well, its just plain junky. It's like Ikea furniture. Looks nice in the pictures but just falls apart.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A Grajewski

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: We love our Shuffleboard table. Just had to get the correct wax because the wax that came with it was way to fast.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Have had the table several months and am very pleased with the quality for a $700 table.
customer_reviews.author: Randy French

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: Table is great enjoyed playing on it. So much fun!! Great buy!!
customer_reviews.author: myangel62

customer_reviews.title: Terrible 1st there instructions on removing gold screws from the ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible 1st there instructions on removing gold screws from the bottom very vague. Two were marked remove several others were not. Be sure you remove all of them before leveling. If you don't you will strip out the cheap climate adjusters. I have tried to put larger ones in but the board is so warped (con caved) that it won't pull it flat. I have ordered a different style of adjusters for another $150 I hope they work. I would not recommend this board to anyone!!!!! It has been a real pain. Blue Wave Customer Service sucks!!!!
customer_reviews.author: fredmesa

customer_reviews.title: We are hoping that with a bit more wear and tear that it will slide more like other boards
customer_reviews.text: This shuffleboard is very pleasant to look at. You get to choose delivery time. The board itself and the ice provided make it a bit slipperier than other boards I've used which you have to get used to. We are hoping that with a bit more wear and tear that it will slide more like other boards. For the price, this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not impressed
customer_reviews.text: Came pretty badly out of level. The board it's self if warped such that the middle is higher than the sides. It's been a week now and still trying to level it back down. The sand is way to fast for this small of table. Had to order slower sand. The corners of the table are not smooth with the rest of straight edges. Not impressed at all. Instructions are poor as well.
customer_reviews.author: LivingTesla

customer_reviews.title: Table quality appears to be very good. However
customer_reviews.text: Table quality appears to be very good. However, the table arrived unassembled. Nowhere in the description was that indicated. It was also sent UPS non-freight. Fortunately I was home to help the UPS driver. Unfortunately I threw my back out in the process. Hopefully the life of the table will be better than its inception.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Roberts

product_meta.title: Challenger Shuffleboard Table w Dark Cherry Finish, Hardwood Playfield and Storage Cabinets
feature_bullets: PROFESSIONAL GRADE – With a hardwood butcher block playfield coated in a sleek, polyurethane surface, the Challenger offers silky-smooth play that’s highly accurate.
STABLE AND SECURE – Independent leg levelers provide a flat and steady surface. Integrated climate adjusters ensure that the solid wood playfield can be easily tuned for optimum play.
DIMENSIONS - Table Dimensions: 144.75-in L x 24.25-in W x 30.5-in H; Playing Surface: 132-in L x 15-in W x 1.5-in H

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
